info.title: Video Search Application
info.description: Application to search videos, video details and trending videos

tags.name: Video Search
tags.description: Search videos, video details and trending videos using Bing Video Search API

get.description:
Search videos using various query parameters. This endpoint will search videos based on your searchQuery and other parameters entered.

**All query parameter values having fixed options are case-sensitive
get.summary: Search videos using a search query and various other parameters

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description:
Enter the video search query (what videos you are looking for).

The search query cannot be empty. This is a required field

parameters.name: count
parameters.description:
Enter the number of videos to return in the response.

The actual number delivered may be less than requested. The default is 35. The maximum is 105.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
Enter the zero-based offset that indicates the number of videos to skip before returning videos.

The default is 0. Use this parameter along with the count parameter.
For example, if you want to display 20 videos per page, set count to 20 and offset to 0 to get the first page of results. For each subsequent page, increment offset by 20 (for example, 0, 20, 40).

parameters.name: market
parameters.description:
Enter the market from where you want the results to come from.

Typically the market should be the country from where the user is making the request, but it also can be another country.

Select market values only from the below list

parameters.name: setLanguage
parameters.description:
Enter the language you would like to set for user interface display.

It is preferred that you always set the language value.
Typically the value is set to the same language specified by the market value, unless you would like to display the user interface strings in a different language.
If the entered language is not valid or is not supported, then English language will be used by default.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: safeSearch
parameters.description: Enter preference for filtering videos for adult content. Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: aspectRatio
parameters.description:
Enter value to filter the videos by following aspect ratio.

standard—Return videos with standard aspect radio
widescreen—Returns videos with wide screen aspect radio.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: embedded
parameters.description:
Enter value to filter the videos that are embedded by the following case.

player—Returns videos with embeddable player

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: freshness
parameters.description:
Enter value to filter the videos by the date and time that they were discovered by Bing. Following are the available filters.

Day—Return videos discovered within the last 24 hours
Week—Return videos discovered within the last 7 days
Month—Return videos discovered within the last 30 days

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description:
Enter value to filter the videos by the resolution. Following are the available resolution filters.

lowerthan_360p—Return videos with lower than 360p resolution
360p—Return videos with a 360p or higher resolution
480p—Return videos with a 480p or higher resolution
720p—Return videos with a 720p or higher resolution
1080p—Return videos with a 1080p or higher resolution
All—Do not filter by resolution. Specifying this value is the same as not specifying the resolution parameter.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: videoLength
parameters.description:
Enter value to filter the videos by length. Following are the available videoLength filter.

Short—Return videos that are less than 5 minutes
Medium—Return videos that are between 5 and 20 minutes, inclusive
Long—Return videos that are longer than 20 minutes
All—Do not filter by length. Specifying this value is the same as not specifying the videoLength parameter.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: pricing
parameters.description:
Enter value to filter the videos by pricing options. Following are the pricing options.

Free—Return videos that are free to view
Paid—Return videos that require a subscription or payment to view
All—Do not filter by pricing. Specifying this value is the same as not specifying the pricing parameter.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: textDecorations
parameters.description:
Specify if you want to display strings containing decoration markers such as hit highlighting characters.

If set to true, the strings may include markers.
Default value is false

parameters.name: textFormat
parameters.description:
Specify the type of marker to use for text decorations. Following are the marker values

Raw—Use Unicode characters to mark content that needs special formatting.
HTML—Use HTML tags to mark content that needs special formatting.

Select values only from the below list

200.description:
Success. Videos found.

1. The `value` array parameter holds the list of found videos for given searchQuery and other passed query parameters
2. The `queryExpansions` spec holds a list of expanded queries that narrows the original query. For instance, if the searchQuery were Adele+Songs, then the expaneded queries could be Adele Songs Grammy, Adele Sad Songs, etc.
3. The `pivotSuggestions` spec hold a list of pivots that segment the original searchQuery. For instance, if the searchQuery was Adele Songs, one of the segments or pivot could be Adele and this pivot may contain query suggestions like Adele life history or Adele Grammy Speech. The other pivot could be songs having query suggestions like 10 top hit songs of 2020, etc

400.description: One of the query parameters is missing or not valid.

401.description: The subscription key is missing or is not valid to call Bing Video Search API.

403.description: The user is authenticated, but they don’t have permission to the requested resource of Binge Video Search API.

410.description: The request used HTTP instead of the HTTPS protocol to call the Bing Video Search API. HTTPS is the only supported protocol by Bing Video Search API.

429.description: The caller exceeded their queries per second quota for Bing Video Search API.

get.description:
Fetch different video details like video results and related videos for a video ID.

**All query parameter values having fixed options are case-sensitive
get.summary: Fetch various video details using a video ID and various other parameters.

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description:
Enter the video ID to uniquely identify the video.

This parameter is a required field and is used to identify the video to get insights of.
The Video object's `videoId` field contains the ID that you set this parameter.

Example of videoId: 5A79D2E7E6896F8C881B5A79D2E7E6896F8C881B

parameters.name: modules
parameters.description:
Enter the list of insights you would like to request for the specified video. This is a required field

This parameter value should be a comma separated list of one or more values from the following list

All—Return all available insights.
RelatedVideos—Return a list of videos that are similar to the video specified by the `videoId` query parameter.
VideoResult—Return the video details of the video specified in the `videoId`query parameter.

You may select multiple values from the below list.

NOTE: Please do not select any other value if you select the `All` option.
Please press command/control and then click on list items to select multiple values from the below list input

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description:
Enter the video search query (what videos you are looking for)

Althought this parameter is not mandatory here, it is prefered that you always specify it because it helps to improve relevance and the results.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description:
Enter the number of videos to return in the response.

The actual number delivered may be less than requested. The default is 35. The maximum is 105.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
Enter the zero-based offset that indicates the number of videos to skip before returning videos.

The default is 0. Use this parameter along with the count parameter.
For example, if you want to display 20 videos per page, set count to 20 and offset to 0 to get the first page of results. For each subsequent page, increment offset by 20 (for example, 0, 20, 40).

parameters.name: market
parameters.description:
Enter the market from where you want the results to come from.

Typically the market should be the country from where the user is making the request, but it also can be another country.

Select market values only from the below list

parameters.name: setLanguage
parameters.description:
Enter the language you would like to set for user interface display.

It is preferred that you always set the language value.
Typically the value is set to the same language specified by the market value, unless you would like to display the user interface strings in a different language.
If the entered language is not valid or is not supported, then English language will be used by default.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: safeSearch
parameters.description: Enter preference for filtering videos for adult content. Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: textDecorations
parameters.description:
Specify if you want to display strings containing decoration markers such as hit highlighting characters.

If set to true, the strings may include markers.
Default value is false

parameters.name: textFormat
parameters.description:
Specify the type of marker to use for text decorations. Following are the marker values

Raw—Use Unicode characters to mark content that needs special formatting.
HTML—Use HTML tags to mark content that needs special formatting.

Select values only from the below list

200.description:
Success. Video(s) found.
1. The `relatedVideos` spec holds the list of videos related to the video specified in the videoId.
2. The `videoResult` spec holds information details of the video specified in the videoId

NOTE: If there is not data available for the requested insight, then the respective object will not be returned in the response.
For example, if the requested insight is `RelatedVideos` and no data is available for that insight for specified video, then the `relatedVideos` object will not be returned in the response

400.description: One of the query parameters is missing or not valid.

401.description: The subscription key is missing or is not valid to call Bing Video Search API.

403.description: The user is authenticated, but they don’t have permission to the requested resource of Binge Video Search API.

410.description: The request used HTTP instead of the HTTPS protocol to call the Bing Video Search API. HTTPS is the only supported protocol by Bing Video Search API.

429.description: The caller exceeded their queries per second quota for Bing Video Search API.

get.description:
Fetch videos that are trending based on search requests made by other users. The videos are broken out into different categories. For example, Top Music Videos.

**All query parameter values having fixed options are case-sensitive
get.summary: Fetch videos that are trending based on search requests made by other users.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description:
Enter the market from where you want the results to come from.

Typically the market should be the country from where the user is making the request, but it also can be another country.

Select market values only from the below list

parameters.name: setLanguage
parameters.description:
Enter the language you would like to set for user interface display.

It is preferred that you always set the language value.
Typically the value is set to the same language specified by the market value, unless you would like to display the user interface strings in a different language.
If the entered language is not valid or is not supported, then English language will be used by default.

Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: safeSearch
parameters.description: Enter preference for filtering videos for adult content. Select values only from the below list

parameters.name: textDecorations
parameters.description:
Specify if you want to display strings containing decoration markers such as hit highlighting characters.

If set to true, the strings may include markers.
Default value is false

parameters.name: textFormat
parameters.description:
Specify the type of marker to use for text decorations. Following are the marker values

Raw—Use Unicode characters to mark content that needs special formatting.
HTML—Use HTML tags to mark content that needs special formatting.

Select values only from the below list

200.description:
Success. Trending Video(s) found.
1. The `bannerTiles` spec holds the most popular trending videos which can come from one or more categories.
2. The `categories` spec holds trending videos listed by category and subcategory

400.description: One of the query parameters is missing or not valid.

401.description: The subscription key is missing or is not valid to call Bing Video Search API.

403.description: The user is authenticated, but they don’t have permission to the requested resource of Binge Video Search API.

410.description: The request used HTTP instead of the HTTPS protocol to call the Bing Video Search API. HTTPS is the only supported protocol by Bing Video Search API.

429.description: The caller exceeded their queries per second quota for Bing Video Search API.
